title: Idol

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose to dazzle someone during the day to make them your Admirer. Only usable if there is no alive Admirer.
- Choose a player for your Admirer to deal a Basic attack to each night. They do this along with their other abilities unless they are using another attacking ability. You may, once per game, choose to raise this attack to Unstoppable.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your Admirer has a private chat with you and wins if and only if you win. Dead Admirers retain access to this chat but may not talk in it.
- If you die, your Admirer gains the ability to deal a Powerful attack to a player each night that they may use along with their other night abilities.
- When an Admirer dies, they are not revealed to have been an Admirer.
- You are roleblock immune.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you, or have an Admirer and no other players who would oppose you alive at the end of the game.
